card.description: Daily rental data from Washington, D.C.'s Capital Bikeshare system from 2011 and 2012, along with weather data for those days.

context.potentialUses: Predict how many bikes will be rented based on weather conditions, or time of year.

fields.description: The record's unique index or key. This shouldn't be used as a feature.
The date the records were taken.
Season: spring, summer, winter or fall
Whether or not the day is a holiday
The day of the week: 0 (Sunday) to 6 (Saturday).
Whether or not this is a work day.
A description of the day's weather, ranging from a few clouds to light snow or rain.
Average temperature in Celsius, normalized to a 0 to 1 scale where 0 = -8 degrees celsius and 1 equals 39 degrees celsius.
Average "feels like" temperature in Celsius, normalized to a 0 to 1 scale where 0 = -16 degrees celsius and 1 equals 50 degrees celsius.
Humidity, normalized to 0 (0% humidity) to 1 (100% humidity)
Number of users without an account
Number of users with an account
